Springdale.Hemingway House and Barn (Fayetteville,: The Hemingway House and Barn is a historic summer estate at 3310 Old Missouri Road in Fayetteville, Arkansas. The house is a two-story wood-frame gambrel-roofed structure, set in a landscape designed (as were the buildings) by noted Little Rock architect Charles L. Thompson. The house and barn were built for Elwin Hemingway, a local lawyer.
